name: Starrghazers
description:
• A text-based adventure where your ship could be captured by communist rebels or worse!
  • Fight for your bounty and race to the center of the galaxy for the great artifacts of unknown alien civilizations!

Pillage, rob and drink rum! What kind of captain will you be?

Credits:
Doruk Hasdogan (DemonSpirit)
